Pass the SALT 2018.
July 2-4, 2018 - Lille, France.

A free Security & Free Software conference.


For setting up bridges between Security communities and Free Software hackers!

More informations!

News:

  • Pass the SALT goal and RMLL Security track results - 27 December 2017
  • Pass the SALT is officially launched! - 26 December 2017

Timeline:

2018 Pass the SALT has currently reach this stage:

  • ANNOUNCEMENT : launch of the 2018 Pass the SALT
  • January 23, 2018 : openning of the Call For Paper
  • March 31, 2018 : closing of the Call For Paper
  • April 15, 2018 : notification of the speakers
  • April 30, 2018 : publication of the program
  • Mid May, 2018 : openning of the booking interface
    (entrance is free but due to the capcity of the room, booking is required).
  • July 2-4, 2018 : the conference :-)
Smart speakers on stage
and packed room of focused attendees
Come and exchange extensively with developers of top OSS projects !
or just enjoy the moment with new and/or old friends :)
Attendees often provide a funny atmosphere ...
... usually welcomed by our open minded speakers ;-)

Contents


Conferences

Meet speakers coming to expose Free Software projects for Security purposes, Security topics in Free Software projects or open standards dealing with Security !
All the talks will be given in English in order to share the conference with non French speaking speakers in the more confortable manner.
You don't see what we are talking about ? Have a look to previous editions contents and speakers who came to speak !

Networking

Exchange experiences, set up new relationships with accessibles attendees and speakers coming from very various areas from hackitivists to professional security reversers or Free Software enthusiasts.

Moreover these exchanges will be done in a beautiful place and in a warm and open-minded ambiance :)
